Name: Image.Zoom
Desc: Zooms the image in or out around a center point.
LongDesc: The Zoom method scales the image by a given factor, centered on a specified point. It supports smoothing, quality settings, and background fill for areas outside the image. Useful for interactive image viewers and focus effects.
Example:
var img = new Q.Image({ width: 200, height: 200 });
img.Load('photo.jpg', function() { img.Zoom(2); });
